title: WOMEN ONLY SECRET SOCIETY (NXIVM) PT 2: "Collateral Damaged"
itunes:title: WOMEN ONLY SECRET SOCIETY (NXIVM) PT 2: "Collateral Damaged"
description:
“It’s exclusive,” she was told. A women only secret society. 

She was a chosen one, after all. 

A badass ninja warrior woman, she was ready to set the world on fire. 

Finally surrounded by people that shared her same vision, she would do whatever it takes. 

Jessica Joan was ready for anything.

Well... almost anything. 


__


If you, or anyone you know, has successfully escaped a cult, please reach out to us. We'd love to hear from you and have your story and voice be heard on a future episode: cults@iHEARTmedia.com 


__


Jessica Joan's Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lovejessjoan/?hl=en


You can purchase Jessica's book here:

http://theuntouchablejessicajoan.com

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
